title: Reminder: NRL Live Pass Isn't Streaming The Grand Final This Year
text:
Image: Supplied

If you're planning to stream the 2019 NRL Grand Final through the NRL Live Pass app, we have some bad news for you. Due to a change in digital rights ownership, the NRL Grand Final will only be available through Channel 9 streaming services. Here's how to get connected.

For those who didn't get the memo, Channel Nine has acquired exclusive digital rights to the NRL Final for the next four years. This means you can't watch the match on the NRL Live Pass app - even if you're a paying customer.

Here are the details from the NRL website:

Due to changes in the NRL Digital Rights agreement from 2018 to 2022, the NRL Grand Final will not be available to live stream via NRL Live Pass on the NRL Official App.

The good news is that Nine's 9Now web app will be providing a HD stream of the game - live and completely free. Click here to bookmark the site!

You can find out everything you need to know about the match, including start times and ticket availability at the link below.
description: If you're planning to stream the 2019 NRL Grand Final through the NRL Live Pass app, we have some bad news for you. Due to a change in digital rights ownership, the NRL Grand Final will only be available through Channel 9 streaming services. Here's how to get connected....
